articles.title: High-resolution 3D study of pine pollen reveals nanofoams are key to surviving mass extinctions - Nanowerk
articles.description: Scientists have found that some pollen has survived mass extinctions thanks, in part, to its nanofoam wall structure. This may explain why the survival of certain plants. It is the first time scientists have described a biological nanofoam structure.
